Since we plan to work on the boat while sailing the world, we needed to get some communications in order.  We have a few options for communications:

## Satellite Phone

We have a satellite phone that we can use to make phone calls and send text messages.  We can also use it to send/receive email and text messages.  Too expensive and limited range (Southern Hemisphere)
